EmailTemplate.subject: Refer your friends to NCS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
If your friends sign up to NCS you’ll receive a Love2Shop voucher from us!
Refer your friends to NCS Dear {!IF"(!Contact.Parent_Name__c)"="" "Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.FirstName}" "{!Contact.Parent_Name__c}"
We hope – {!Contact.FirstName} - had a great time taking part in NCS last year. We would love to hear more about their experience.
If you’re happy to send over a brief quote to describe {!Contact.FirstName}'s experience on NCS it would really help us encourage other schools and students to take part in the programme. You can do this simply by emailing your quote to ncsquote@the-challenge.org
Referring friends: You also have the chance to share your unique code with any friends or family who would like to sign up their young person.*
How it works: When someone uses your code to sign up they will pay the discounted price of £35. You will also automatically receive a £20 Love2Shop voucher which can be used in a variety of stores and restaurants including John Lewis, Marks and Spencer and Pizza Hut.**
What to do: Click here to start: http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/referafriend/ We are really looking forward to hearing from you.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
*Participants must be 16 or 17 on 31 August of the current calendar year. This means 15 year olds can attend summer programmes providing they turn 16 on or before 31 August that year. ** A maximum of 3 vouchers will be given to one person/family
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
